• Generates reproducible SVG patterns using deterministic seeded randomness
  • Provides six artistic styles (Memphis, Bauhaus, etc.) with adjustable complexity
  • Exports designs as SVG or PNG with texture effects and palette controls
    function PRNG(seedStr) {
    document.getElementById('generate').addEventListener('click', generate);

This application creates customizable vector patterns using a seed-based pseudo-random generator. Parameters control dimensions, pattern complexity, color schemes, and texture overlays. Outputs maintain deterministic reproducibility across sessions and support SVG/PNG export.
